cchen.shapes

Class Line_Original

  • java.lang.Object
    • cchen.shapes.Shape
      • cchen.shapes.Line_Original

  • public class Line_Original
extends Shape
    Represents line segments. This is my original Line class.
    Version:
    9 Sept 2018
    Author:
    ClaireC

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class cchen.shapes.Shape

        strokeB, strokeG, strokeR, x1, y1

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Line_Original()
      Creates an object representing a line segment of 0 length, at (0,0).
      Line_Original(double x1, double y1, double x2, double y2)
      Creates an object representing a line segment with endpoints (x1, y1) and (x2, y2).

                     double y1,

        Creates an object representing a line segment with endpoints (x1, y1) and (x2, y2).
        Parameters:
        x1 - The x-coordinate of the 1st endpoint
        y1 - The y-coordinate of the 1st endpoint
        x2 - The x-coordinate of the 2nd endpoint
        y2 - The y-coordinate of the 2nd endpoint

                                     double y1,
                                     double theta,

        Generates line segment starting at (x1, y1), but with a given length and angle above the horizontal.
        Parameters:
        x1 - The x-coordinate of the 1st endpoint
        y1 - The y-coordinate of the 1st endpoint
        theta - Angle above the horizontal of this line

        Calculates and returns the slope of a segment between the given endpoints

        y1 - The y-coordinate of the 1st endpoint
        x2 - The x-coordinate of the 2nd endpoint
        y2 - The y-coordinate of the 2nd endpoint

      • slope

        public double slope()
        Returns the slope for horizontal and vertical lines
        Returns:
        The slope of the Line. If the Line is vertical (that is, x1 = x2), the method returns Double.MAX_VALUE

      • intersects

        public boolean intersects(Line_Original other)
        Checks if this Line intersects another Line object
        Parameters:
        other - The Line to check for intersection with
        Returns:
        true if the Lines intersect, false if otherwise
